person.name: Vivek Kumar
person.info: Resident, CB1. B.Tech (Computer Science) Over 20 years of experience across Railways, Power Electronics, Automotive, Telecom, and IoT industries, with expertise in Electronics, Embedded Systems, and over a decade in Tech Support and Sales.

person.name: Amit Rajput
person.info: Resident, CS10. B.Sc., Masters in Computer Expert in advanced system architecture, specializing in society digitization and security, designing solutions for safer, smarter, and resident-centric communities.

person.name: Shashi Jyoti
person.info: Resident, CC2. B.E. (Electrical), NIT, Jamshedpur (1987), 38 years of experience with the Indian Air Force and BEL (Maharatna DPSU), specializing in security deployment, tendering, price negotiation, and contract formulation.

person.name: Lokesh Kumar
person.info: Resident, CMC2 A seasoned technology leader with 25 years of experience in infrastructure modernization and digital transformation, dedicated to fostering a smarter, transparent, and future-ready community.

person.name: Neeraj Sharma
person.info: Resident, CV2 and CS4. A seasoned journalist with over two decades of experience in media and communication. Known for his strong and influential voice on community welfare and social issues, he has been a driving force for positive change. As the Authorised Representative of Capetown Society, he is leading efforts for the legal registry of flats and consistently advocating for residents' rights with integrity, transparency,courage, and commitment.

person.name: Neeraj Sharma
person.info: Resident, CV2 and CS4. A seasoned journalist with over two decades of experience in media and communication. Known for his strong and influential voice on community welfare and social issues, he has been a driving force for positive change. As the Authorised Representative of Capetown Society, he is leading efforts for the legal registry of flats and consistently advocating for residents' rights with integrity, transparency,courage, and commitment.

person.name: Rajiv Ranjan
person.info: Resident, CG5 and CB2. B.Sc. MBA (IT) A seasoned IT and security surveillance professional with over 20 years of experience in project delivery, strategic account management and providing end-to-end solutions for government and enterprise clients. Advocating integrity, transparency, and NRO voting rights. Committed to fighting corruption and bringing positive change to Capetown Society.

person.name: Satish Rai
person.info: Resident, CS5. B.Sc., FCA Chartered Accountant specializing in society compliance and auditing, with over 40 years of professional experience.

person.name: Shailendra Singh
person.info: Resident, CG3. M.Sc. (Agri) Horticulture Over 18 years of experience in global organic and sustainable farming certification, with expertise in managing large-scale agriculture and horticulture projects from planning to execution.

person.name: Sonam Gupta
person.info: Resident, CB2. B.Com, MBA Experienced in admission counselling and community engagement, actively contributing to Capetown's daily life. Advocates for transparency, good governance, and a corruption-free, inclusive, and family-friendly society.

person.name: Sukanta Bhattacharya
person.info: Resident, CS3. Retired MNC professional and Ex-President of SCWA Capetown, advocating integrity, transparency, and NRO voting rights. Committed to fighting corruption and bringing positive change to Capetown Society.
